text:
Dear  <@U0846LQ5R45>,
Just fill the `"integrationThreadId"` when using the endpoint <https://api.hubapi.com/conversations/v3/custom-channels/{channelId}/messages> to send message to the same thread. Additionally you have also `"inReplyToId"` to manage a direct reply to message.
That did it. I don't how I missed it. Especially since you were having conversation about it too. You are a savior! Thank you so much!
